trans-unit.id: Plan a trip on your phone or press firmly to access your favourites.

Button to save a trip to the agenda
Title for button to access agenda
Error title when agenda isn't yet set up.
Button to agree to EULA or a similar agreement
Option to use this trip for all similar cases.
Option to delete this event and all after in a recurrence
Type for regular events that go in the phone's calendar.
Indicating the next trip is a current trip
Button to dismiss something, e.g., an error or action action sheet
Title for button to access favourites
Message to show when trying to get trip for a favorite
Type for events that are regular visit's to one of the user's favorites
Typical name that you'd give your home location
Inidcating the watch app is loading
Button to show a map or to modify the map's settings
Indicator that a transport mode will appear minimised on the routes screen.
Option to delete only this event in a recurence

trans-unit.id: Please delete the app and re-install from the App Store. Sorry for the inconvenience!
trans-unit.source: Please delete the app and re-install from the App Store. Sorry for the inconvenience!
trans-unit.target: 현제 어플리케이션을 삭제하고 다시 설치해 주세요. 불편을 드려 죄송 합니다!
trans-unit.note: Recovery suggestion when TripGo cannot access its local files

trans-unit.id: Please restart the app. Sorry for the inconvenience!
trans-unit.source: Please restart the app. Sorry for the inconvenience!
trans-unit.target: 현재 어플리케이션을 다시 실행해 주세요. 불편을 끼쳐 드려서 죄송합니다.
trans-unit.note: Recovery suggestion when an app restart is required, e.g., when the database got corrupted and/or the app can't access its local files.
Action title to reset something, e.g., settings

trans-unit.id: Set up your Agenda in the TripGo app.
trans-unit.source: Set up your Agenda in the TripGo app.

Action title to show map for a segment
Action button on trip reminders to snooze it for a fixed amount.
Action button on public transport trip reminders to skip this service and get reminded for the next service
Stay, i.e., type for dates you're staying at a hotel, or when moving house.

trans-unit.id: Time to leave! Your trip commences at %@
trans-unit.source: Time to leave! Your trip commences at %@

trans-unit.note: Indicating the next trip is an upcoming trip
Button to view something, e.g., a notification content or the EULA
Class = "UIButton"; accessibilityLabel = "Swap from and to"; ObjectID = "30";
Minutes format (used for transfer times). (old key: Minutes)
Minutes format (used alert firing X minuts before departure). (old key: MinutesBefore)
Title for linked third-party account, e.g., 'Uber Account'
Filler for a specific service running at a time, e.g., '396 at 11:56am'
Filler for a specific frequency-based service indicating its frequency, e.g., 'M10 every 10 minutes'
Airline flight number with %airline and %flightNumber, e.g., 'Qantas flight QF1'. (old key: AirlineFlightNumber)
'About' for a provider, usually takes users to view a web page, e.g., 'About PayiQ'
Error title when access to location hasn't been granted, but location is required.
Error text to show when trying to use a feature which requires an account, but the user hasn't set one up (yet).
Action title for adding a vehicle
Action title for adding another habitual visit to a favourite. (old key: NewItemHereActionTitle)
Confirmation that something got added HUD notice
Alert title that indicates an address is missing when creating a new event.
Title for agenda screen while it's still in setup mode.
Action button title to see alternative options for the case where you can't make the next connection.
Title for section to assign a trip to a vehicle.
Filler for a service running at time, e.g., 'At 11:56am'
Header for settings of reminders automatically added by TripGo through the agenda
Response to positive answer to question whether TripGo is useful, prompting for App Store rating.

trans-unit.id: Bookings made with TripGo will appear here.

trans-unit.source: Zoom into map to view public transport stops

trans-unit.note: Description of a what3words address, which is an addressing-sytem alternative to GPS or regular addresses based on 3 word pairs, e.g., 'gazed-across-like`.
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Indicator for how cycle-friendly a cycling route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of stops before you get off a vehicle, if there are 2 stops or more, e.g., '10 stops'. (old key: Stops)
Indicator for how wheelchair-friendly a wheeelchair route is. Placeholder will get replaced with '75%'.
Number of stops before you get off a stop, if there's just 1 stop.
Prefix for selected 'arrive by' time Single line instruction to arrive
'%@' will be replaced with the arrival time. (old key: ArrivalTime)
The first '%@' will be replaced with the place of arrival, the second with the time. (old key: ArrivalLocationTime)
Title for when you'll arrive when on a trip. Countdown to arrival will be displayed below.
'At %location' indicator for parts of a trip that happen at a single location, e.g., waiting at a platform, parking at a car park. (old key: PrimaryLocationStationary)
Action title for calling provider of name. (old key: CallTaxiFormat)

As in 'this bus/train has few seats available'
As in 'this bus/train is full and likely can't accept further passengers'

Indication of an activity. (old key: ActivityIndication)

trans-unit.id: Could not download supported regions from TripGo's server. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Could not download supported regions from TripGo's server. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: TripGo 서버에서 지원되는 지역이 다운로드 되지 않았습니다. 나중에 다시 시도해 주세요.
trans-unit.note: Could not download supported regions warning. (old key: CouldNotDownloadSupportedRegions)
Message that indicates the app is creating accounts for users
Section title for credit card payment

trans-unit.id: Don't have an account? Sign up

Email address where receipt is sent Email used as Facebook username
'Every %day' in context of repetitions (especially recurring events), e.g., 'Every Monday'. (old key: EveryDayFormat)
Everyday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)
Option that allows users to indicate whether reminder is needed Reminder to leave preference
Accessibility annotation for trips which have a reminder set.
Title for alert that indicates the user account has become invalid
Used when user signs in using Facebook
Title on the button that indicates to the user that booking is in progressing

trans-unit.id: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.source: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.target: 위치 서비스는 이 기능을 요구합니다. 설정으로 가서 어플리케이션 > 개인 정보 > 위치 서비스를 켜주세요.

trans-unit.note: Indicating a payment is in progress
Option that allows users to indicate how eary to show trip reminder Reminder to leave preference
Title for view that shows the summary of a user's account information
Name to which receipt is sent Name used in Facebook Sort by name Title for name of something (or someone)
Response to question whether user wants to report a problem when taking a screenshot. Also used in context of repetitions (especially recurring events).
Title for sign in view when user does not have an account
Authorisation ok button Default title for button that dismisses alert view Error alert cancel Ok action
Button to open Settings app section for this app

trans-unit.id: Please try again or set your location manually.
trans-unit.source: Please try again or set your location manually.
trans-unit.note: Error recovery suggestion when GPS fails.

trans-unit.target: 더 자세한 정보를 원하시면 검색을 눌러주세요.
trans-unit.note: Location picker 'no autocompletion results' text. Needs to match text on keyboard.
Title for section that asks users where payment receipt should be sent
Action title to add/remove reminder Section title at the end of a booking that allows users to set reminders
Button title to report a problem
Retry action, e.g., in case something didn't load
Sort by overall score, like a ranking.
Placeholder text while waiting for server response when searching for a location.
Button that goes to the Setting's app
Instruction for signing out user account

trans-unit.id: Sign up cannot be completed without a valid password
trans-unit.source: Sign up cannot be completed without a valid password

trans-unit.note: Message that indicates the app is signing users into their user accounts
Message that indicates the app has successfully completed signing out Message that indicates the app is signing users out of their accounts

trans-unit.source: The app will now sign out

user location button - follow with heading
Message that shows app is updating trip after user finalised bookings
Message that informs users that some values are missing from the required fields in a booking form.

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the booking terms and conditions.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.source: You need to agree to the insurance terms and conditions.
trans-unit.note: Message that informs users that T&C for insurance must be agreed before booking can be made.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your calendar. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Calendar and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: 캘린더 엑세스가 거부되어 있습니다. > 설정으로 가서 > 캘린더 개인 정보 사용을 허용해 주세요.

trans-unit.id: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.
trans-unit.source: You previously denied this app access to your contacts. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Contacts and authorise this app to use this feature.

trans-unit.note: Indicator that an event is all-day
Estimated time of arrival; parameter is time, e.g., 'arrives 15:30'
Estimated time of departure; parameter is time, e.g., 'departs 15:30'
